titles.title: Federal Internet Tax Prohibition Act of 2005
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to ensure that the federal excise tax on communication services does not apply to internet access service.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/11/2005--Introduced. Federal Internet Tax Prohibition Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt Internet access service from the excise tax on communication services.
